name: Calligraphy Tavern
title: Calligraphy Tavern
desc: "Well, if you're offering... Paimon will take a glass of Bulle Fruit Tonic! ...Um, but hold the Tonic, hehe!"

skills.desc:
When played: Randomly create 1 Origami Flying Squirrel, Pop-Up Paper Frog, or Origami Hamster, and add it to your Hand.
When you declare the end of your Round: Randomly trigger 1 of your Simulanka Summon's "End Phase" effects.
Usage(s): 3
